meanings.definition: A game played by bouncing a ball against a stoop or wall.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the children enjoyed a fun game of stoopball.
meanings.sent2: Let's go outside and play stoopball after school.
meanings.sent3: The stoopball game got so intense that the ball almost hit Mrs. Jenkins' window!
meanings.sent4: In the quiet neighborhood, the sound of stoopball echoed off the walls.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of stoopball made it a favorite pastime for the kids.

meanings.definition: To play the game of stoopball.
meanings.sent1: We stoopball in the park every weekend.
meanings.sent2: He stoopballs with his friends every afternoon.
meanings.sent3: After finishing their homework, the siblings would stoopball until dinner time.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic sound of the ball stoopballing against the wall was soothing.
meanings.sent5: She taught her little brother how to stoopball properly.

meanings.definition: The ball used in the game of stoopball.
meanings.sent1: Tom lost his favorite stoopball and couldn't play anymore.
meanings.sent2: The bright red stoopball bounced off the stoop with a satisfying thud.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog ran off with the stoopball, causing laughter among the players.
meanings.sent4: The stoopball rolled down the street, chased by a group of excited kids.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out stoopball had seen many games and adventures.
